alert.note: Alert for Edwards; Pawnee (Kansas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued July 17 at 4:14PM CDT until July 17 at 4:45PM CDT by NWS Dodge City
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 445 PM CDT FOR SOUTHWESTERN PAWNEE AND NORTH CENTRAL EDWARDS COUNTIES... At 414 PM CDT, a severe thunderstorm was located very near Garfield, moving southeast at 15 mph. HAZARD...Tennis ball size hail and 60 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...People and animals outdoors will be injured. Expect hail damage to roofs, siding, windows, and vehicles. Expect wind damage to roofs, siding, and trees. Locations impacted include... Kinsley and Garfield. THUNDERSTORM DAMAGE THREAT...CONSIDERABLE HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...2.50 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
